'''Mallow Wood''' is a type of [[Wood]] that is obtained by cutting down Mallow Trees. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==Locations==
Mallow Wood can be found primarily along the western coasts of the [[Belleau Region]] of [[Fontaine]].
